rules: Rule1: Provided that facility1 exports substance1, substance1 is approved for export.
Rule2: If facility1 exports substance1, then substance1 passes testing.
Rule3: In the event that facility1 develops substance1, either facility1 produces substance1 or facility1 is profitable.
Rule4: Should facility1 research substance1, then either facility1 produces substance1 or facility1 is profitable.
Rule5: Given that facility1 has quality control, if facility1 is not inspected, then facility1 is operational.
Rule6: Assuming facility1 violates regulations, then if facility1 is not inspected, facility1 is not compliant.
Rule7: In cases where facility1 follows regulations, then if facility1 is not inspected, facility1 is not compliant.
Rule8: Whenever person1 reports a violation at facility1, facility1 violates regulations.
Rule9: Person1 reports a violation at facility1 or person1 reports compliance at facility1.
Rule10: If person1 is a whistleblower, then if it is not the case that (if person1 reports compliance at facility1 then facility1 follows regulations), facility1 is investigated.
Rule11: Should facility1 be audited, then facility1 is approved.
Rule12: In the event that facility1 is reviewed, facility1 is approved.
Rule13: If facility1 is condemned, then facility1 is cleared.
Rule14: Provided that person1 finds violations at facility1, facility1's license is not revoked.
Rule15: Whenever facility1 is approved, facility1 is profitable.
Rule16: Assuming person1 finds compliance at facility1, facility1's license is not revoked.
Rule17: If person1 is an inspector, then either person1 finds violations at facility1 or person1 finds compliance at facility1.
Rule18: Should substance1 pass testing, then substance1 is safe.
Rule19: Provided that substance1 is safe, substance1 meets standards.
Rule20: If facility1 is inspected, then facility1 is approved.
Rule21: Facility1 is fined, or facility1 is shutdown, or if facility1 is not inspected, then facility1 is not compliant.
Rule22: Whenever facility1 is certified, facility1 is licensed.
Rule23: If it is not the case that (facility1 produces substance1 or facility1 is profitable), then substance1 is contaminated.
Rule24: In the event that it is not the case that (facility1 produces substance1 or facility1 is profitable), then substance1 is not contaminated.
Rule25: Assuming it is not the case that (facility1 develops substance1 or facility1 researches substance1), then facility1 abandons substance1.
Rule26: Should it not be the case that (facility1 develops substance1 or facility1 researches substance1), then facility1 does not abandon substance1.
Rule27: In cases where it is not the case that (if person1 reports compliance at facility1 then facility1 follows regulations), facility1 is not investigated.
Rule28: Whenever it is not the case that (facility1 is audited or facility1 is reviewed), facility1 is condemned.
Rule29: Should it not be the case that (facility1 is audited or facility1 is reviewed), then facility1 is not cleared.
Rule30: In the event that it is not the case that (facility1's license is renewed or, if facility1 is not profitable, then facility1 is licensed), facility1's license is revoked.
Rule31: Provided that facility1 is not inspected, facility1 is compliant.
Rule32: Assuming facility1 is not inspected, facility1 is not operational.
Rule33: In cases where facility1 is not profitable, facility1 exports substance1.
Rule34: If facility1 is not profitable, then facility1 is certified.
facts: Fact4: It is not the case that facility1 produces substance1.
Fact5: It is not the case that substance1 is approved for export.
Fact6: It is not the case that facility1's license is renewed.
Fact7: It is not the case that substance1 meets standards.
Fact8: It is not the case that facility1 is shutdown.
Fact9: It is not the case that facility1 is fined.
Fact10: It is not the case that facility1 is licensed.
